Magnus laughed at the insistent questioning.

Ultra Magnus: Woah, easy ther=
e! Now, you're eager to get a promotion
or what? Eh, don't mind that, I'm j=
ust kidding! 

He thought for a moment and started walking towards the barr=
acks' exit.

Ultra Magnus: Well, of course, as a Silver Wing, you'll be req=
uired to
perform a lot of police or military action. Our mission here will =
be
more a policing one, for example. We also encourage teamwork and
bravery=
 in the field operations. Basically, try to watch other
people's backs whil=
e we watch yours, and you'll do fine. Anything else
before we go?
